body:
ive heard that VISA sucks ass and that you'll get like 10 dollars instead of 20 and stuff. I was just wondering if this was true? 

Btw, if this counts as spam, sorry.

I want to know because I have the money to buy GOLD! :3

title: Is VISA good..?

replies.body: Visa is fine. I'm also assuming that you're talking about Visa's pre paid cards which are fine also. You do have to pay something like $6 for the cards itself but that beats begging your parents to use their card. I use them and I haven't got any problems so far.
replies.body_tagged: Visa is fine. I'm also assuming that you're talking about Visa's pre paid cards which are fine also. You do have to pay something like $6 for the cards itself but that beats begging your parents to use their card. I use them and I haven't got any problems so far.

replies.body: They're fine, I have gotten one before so I could get an OF cape but yeah the only issue is you have to pay an extra $2.75(discluding tax) for online servicing fees...
replies.body_tagged: They're fine, I have gotten one before so I could get an OF cape but yeah the only issue is you have to pay an extra $2.75(discluding tax) for online servicing fees...

replies.body: VISA works fine for me idk if it'll work here but i dont see why not :D
replies.body_tagged: VISA works fine for me idk if it'll work here but i dont see why not :D

replies.body:
There's only one problem with Visa, and it's how they get profit.
So basically if you have a gift card and have like $1 on it and it expires, that money goes to Visa.
replies.body_tagged:

So basically if you have a gift card and have like $1 on it and it expires, that money goes to Visa.

replies.body: It's free in Sweden if you are under 25, I've never had an issue as long as I have used it and I pay bills and stuff often. I would recommend it :)
